name: Feed the Freds
description:
Welcome to Feed the Freds. This game is my entry to the Trijam 115, the 3 hour game jam. Your objective is simple, feed the right colour pies to the right Fred. Remember, Red Fred only likes red pies, Green Fred only likes green, and Blue Fred only likes blue.

This game is compatible with phones, tablets, and computers.

  CONTROLS:
  • Drag and drop the pies to move them as they fall.
  • Align the pies with the Fred of the corresponding colour.
  • Don't feed the wrong Fred the wrong pie and you'll be okay.

  SOURCE CODE:

https://github.com/saricden/trijam115
